item.description:
This is a unique opportunity for Boston Biotech MeetUp members to meet and talk with one of the visionaries of biotechnology.

Dr. Joshua Boger will talk about the lessons he has learned from a lifetime dedicated to serving society through biotechnology.

Dr. Joshua Boger is the founder and CEO of Vertex Pharmaceuticals. He recently announced his upcoming retirement from Vertex after a 20-year record of innovation, scientific advancement, and patient advocacy.

Don't miss this rare opportunity to hear from a true biotechnology pioneer. For more information about Dr. Boger, you can go to:

http://www.vpharm.com...

We encourage you to invite your friends and RSVP today.
item.name: Meet Vertex CEO Dr. Josh Boger: Lessons from Lifetime in Biotechnology
